content.rendered:
2022 Singapore Grand Prix Travel Package Rates

The rates below are based on a package including luxury accommodations for four nights in Singapore, your preferred race viewing, and more. However, you can completely customize your package with additional events and parties, extra nights, day tours, room upgrades, and any other extras that will make your race experience perfect.
Race ViewingPackages From
Premium Grandstand Seating$6,215
Exclusive Hospitality$17,415
Contact our sports travel specialists for your custom trip quote.
*Rates are per person in USD based on double occupancy. Single occupancy rates are available. Triple and Quad occupancy may be available. A 50% deposit will hold your spot. The balance will not be due until 90 days prior to departure. Rates include all local and state taxes. Availability and pricing subject to change prior to booking.
